title: Monday
descrip:
Chapter plan: Lyre and Eager meet and experience intense attraction. This triggers warnings from their respective shurpas. The shurpas don't try to contradict their owners, but they assess the dangers and take up negotiating positions to mediate.

Meanwhile, subplots are launched:
a) Fear & loathing at the office
b) Walf & Sarba tragic romance
c) Pool's travails with shurpas
d) Zero's new shurpa hack.

title: Tuesday
descrip: Chapter plan: Lyre and Eager engineer a meeting. Consumation.

title: Wednesday
descrip: Chapter plan: Bliss, when differences and potential conflicts seem small.

title: Thursday
descrip: Chapter plan: More intense negotiations when the differences in understanding seem irreconcilable.

title: Friday
descrip: Chapter plan: Crisis of decision when Mother is closing in.

title: Sunday
descrip: Chapter plan: Resolution. Lyre and Eager go their own ways, sadder but wiser.
